author: Special Correspondent
text:
Milk is the new medium chosen by the District Election Authority to reach awareness messages to every household.

Following the instruction from the Election Commission of India (ECI), voters’ awareness programmes are being conducted by the office of District Election Officer since March 25.

As part of the programmes, voters’ awareness messages are being printed on the PONLAIT milk sachets since March 27 to ensure that the message reached every household directly.

In a press release, B. Thillaivel, Deputy District Election Officer said around 2 lakh half-litre packets containing messages are being distributed daily.

This would continue till poll date.
title: Message in a sachet
